project_name: Phoenix Mamba V2 - Brain Tumor Detection
description: Next-generation brain tumor detection framework using Selective State-Space Models (Mamba) and Dynamic Snake Convolutions.

files.description: Main PhoenixMambaV2 model definition combining 2.5D aggregation, Mamba blocks, and Heterogeneity Attention.
Implementation of the S6 Layer (Selective State-Space Model) using TensorFlow.
Legacy NeuroSnake architecture combining Dynamic Snake Convolutions and MobileViT.
Clinical and Fast preprocessing pipelines (Skull Strip, Bias Correction, CLAHE).
Physics-informed augmentation simulating MRI artifacts (Rician noise, Ghosting).
Draft research paper outlining the motivation and methodology of the Phoenix Mamba V2 architecture.
Summary of the migration to PARA structure and architectural refinements.
Hyperparameters and configuration for training runs.
Unified CLI entry point for training, testing, and demo execution.

dataset_info.structure: Training/Testing split with subfolders for classes (glioma, meningioma, pituitary, no_tumor)
dataset_info.preprocessing: ClinicalPreprocessor (Skull Strip -> Bias Correct -> CLAHE -> Z-Score)
